node ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/dist/hooks/ntfy/notify.js --priority high --emoji white_check_mark --title "Claude Code - Task Complete" --message "Task is completed"
node ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/dist/hooks/ntfy/notify.js --priority high --emoji shark --title "Claude Code - Permission needed" --message "Permission is needed to proceed with next step"
node ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/dist/hooks/ntfy/notify.js --priority high --emoji clipboard --title "Claude Code - Plan Ready" --message "Plan is ready for review"
